Heading: Proprietary
Note: For example, a publisher’s own identifier. Note that <IDTypeName> is required with proprietary identifiers

Heading: DOI
Note: Digital Object Identifier (variable length and character set beginning ‘10.’, and without https://doi.org/ or the older http://dx.doi.org/)

Heading: IMDB
Note: Motion picture work identifier from the International Movie Database

Heading: ISRC
Note: International Standard Recording Code, 5 alphanumeric characters plus 7 digits

Heading: ISAN
Note: International Standard Audiovisual Number (17 or 26 characters – 16 or 24 hexadecimal digits, plus one or two alphanumeric check characters, and without spaces or hyphens)
